title: Design and Utilization of e-Portfolios Based on Constructivism and Social Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Educational Theory and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Integration of e-portfolios as learning tools in pre-service teacher training programs, emphasizing strategies for constructing socially constructivist learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can understand and explain the constructivist learning activity design principles of e-portfolios
Learners can develop strategies for utilizing e-portfolios to build knowledge communities based on social pedagogy
Learners can visualize learning outcomes through e-portfolios and evaluate reflective practice competencies
Learners can apply the alignment principle of curriculum-assessment-portfolio to create instructional design documents
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
